#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;

        if(n<=2)
        {
            cout<<0<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        
        bool a[40]={0};
        int c1b[40]={0}; //count the ones before
        int i=0,cnt=0,temp=n;
        
        while(temp!=0)
        {
            a[i++] = temp&1;
            temp=temp>>1;
            cnt++;
        }
        
        c1b[0]=0;
        
        for(i=1;i<cnt;i++)
        {
            if(a[i-1]==1)
                c1b[i]=c1b[i-1]+1;
            else
                c1b[i]=c1b[i-1];
        }
        
        temp=n;
        
        if(!(temp&(temp-1)))
        {
            cout<<cnt-2<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        
        int sa=cnt-1,sb=0;

        int j=0,max=1000,flag=0;
        i=cnt-2;
        
        for(j=0;j<=i;j++)
        {
            if(a[j]==1)
            {
                flag=1;
                sb=j;
            }
            
            if(j+c1b[j]>=sa)
            {
                while(i>j)
                {
                    if(a[i]==1)
                    {
                        sa++;
                    }
                    i--;
                    if(sa>j+c1b[j])
                        break;

                }
            }

            if(flag==1)
                sb+=c1b[j];
                
            flag=0;
        }
        
        cout<<(sa>sb?sa:sb)<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
